titles.title: Privatization of Humanities Act
To amend the National Foundation on the Humanities and the Humanities Act of 1965 to abolish the National Endowment for the Arts and the National Council on the Humanities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities. be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

term.name: Federal aid to the arts and humanities
National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities

bill.summary: 1/19/1995--Introduced. Privatization of Humanities Act - Amends the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 to abolish the National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH) and the National Council on the Humanities (NCH). Renames such Act the National Foundation on the Arts Act of 1965. Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to provide for the termination of the affairs of the NEH and the NCH.
